comment.realname: Call me Lover not a Fighter
comment.author: 40482980@N02
comment._content: Yes ... Archieves Should be Freely Available for All to read, so we may Verify History more Accurately.  If Only Future Treaties to be Sign Can be Read by  Everyone before it is Even Sign may Even be Better  As then it Would Truely be Considered a World Document.  Ah Up .. Way To Go..

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content: Thanks!  We are excited to be able to make these images available for free on Flickr!
